trans-unit.source: An endpoint that uses WS-Discovery to find the endpoint address dynamically at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Et endepunkt som bruker oppdagelse til å finne Endepunktsadressen dynamisk under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: When you use a DynamicEndpoint a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> is added to the binding you specify in the DynamicEndpoint constructor if not already present.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en DynamicEndpoint en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>legges til i bindingen du angi i konstruktøren DynamicEndpoint Hvis det ikke finnes allerede.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> property enables you to describe the service you want to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>egenskapen kan du Beskriv tjenesten du vil bruke.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> used by the DynamicEndpoint override these values specified in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>brukes av DynamicEndpoint overstyringen disse verdiene som er angitt i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that provides a discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som gir en endepunktoppdagelse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"></xref> used to search for a service.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"> </xref> brukes til å søke etter en tjeneste.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria> is used to describe the service to call.
